Helix.text:
WHAT: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) model
CATEGORY: AI model
FEATURES: unifies perception, language understanding, and learned control
CAPABILITIES: enables robots to learn from human demonstrations and adapt to new tasks
USERS: logistics and industrial applications
MARKETS: logistics and industrial sectors
INTEGRATIONS: can be integrated with various robots and systems
PRICING: not specified
STAGE: active development
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix-logistics
NOTE: used for logistics package manipulation and triaging

Figure Robots.text:
WHAT: humanoid robots
CATEGORY: robots
FEATURES: designed for logistics and industrial applications
CAPABILITIES: can perform tasks that require human-level speed, precision, and adaptability
USERS: logistics and industrial sectors
MARKETS: logistics and industrial sectors
INTEGRATIONS: can be integrated with Helix VLA model
PRICING: not specified
STAGE: active development
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix-logistics
NOTE: designed for use in logistics and industrial applications

company.text:
